trans-unit.source: Organizes style characteristics of an ASP.NET mobile control.
trans-unit.target: 组织 ASP.NET 移动控件的样式特征。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style> class contains style characteristics common to all mobile controls.
trans-unit.target: 基<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style>类包含共有的所有移动控件的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style> class contain additional style characteristics specific to their associated control.
trans-unit.target: 继承自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style>类包含特定于其关联控件的其他样式特征。

trans-unit.source: Due to the diversity of devices supported by mobile controls, all style properties are advisory, and might or might not be honored depending on the capabilities of the target device.
trans-unit.target: 由于由移动控件支持的设备的多样性，所有样式属性参考性的并且可能或可能不会生效根据目标设备的功能。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates three user-defined styles in a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示中的三个用户定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> object holds three values that correspond to the three defined styles.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>对象包含三个值对应于三个定义的样式。

trans-unit.source: The `OnClick` command event calls the `SelectStyle` function, which changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.StyleReference%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView> object.
trans-unit.target: `OnClick`命令事件调用`SelectStyle`函数，这会更改<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.StyleReference%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextView>对象。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />；权限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The object to be set as the value of <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific" />.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific" /> 的值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific" /> property to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific" /> 属性设置为指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method does not support multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific> objects and will throw an <xref:System.Exception> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific%2A> property is not `null` when <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.AddParsedSubObject%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.AddParsedSubObject%2A>方法不支持多个<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific>对象，并将引发<xref:System.Exception>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific%2A>属性不是`null`时<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.AddParsedSubObject%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific" /> property is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific" /> 属性不为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified alignment for the style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置样式的指定对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing the specified alignment for the style.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，表示样式的指定对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Alignment%2A> property can be set to any of the following values:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Alignment%2A>属性可以设置为任何以下值：

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: No alignment is set for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 没有一致性设置为指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: Aligns to the left.
trans-unit.target: 左对齐。

trans-unit.source: Aligns to the center.
trans-unit.target: 对齐到中心。

trans-unit.source: Aligns to the right.
trans-unit.target: 对齐到右侧。

trans-unit.source: Represents the key used to retrieve the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Alignment" /> setting of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于检索 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Alignment" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> 设置的键。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The control to which the style properties are applied.
trans-unit.target: 样式属性应用到的控件。

trans-unit.source: Applies the properties of a style to a control.
trans-unit.target: 将样式属性应用到控件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The following control properties are affected:
trans-unit.target: 下面的控件属性会受到影响：

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The size of the font.
trans-unit.target: 字体的大小。

trans-unit.source: Whether the font is bold.
trans-unit.target: 无论字体是加粗。

trans-unit.source: Whether the font is italic.
trans-unit.target: 是否为斜体字体。

trans-unit.source: The foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 前景色。

trans-unit.source: The background color.
trans-unit.target: 背景色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified background color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置样式的指定背景色。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The specified background color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 样式的指定背景色。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other properties, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A> property is not inherited from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 与其他属性，不同<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A>不从其父文件夹继承属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A> property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's `BackColor` property to cyan, or you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A> property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A>青色父控件，子控件的属性将不会继承青色背景色; 您必须显式设置子控件的`BackColor`到青色，或者让你的属性必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A>属性控件的父级，并将样式表应用于子控件。

trans-unit.source: This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.
trans-unit.target: 这是与级联样式表的行为一致。

trans-unit.source: The key for retrieving the style from the embedded style sheet for <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于从 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor" /> 属性的嵌入式样式表中检索样式的键。

trans-unit.source: Used internally by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The key for retrieving the style from the embedded style sheet for setting the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Bold" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于从 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Bold" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Font" /> 属性的嵌入式样式表中检索样式的键。

trans-unit.source: Used internally by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> 对象的实例的一个副本。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: A copy of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> 实例的一个副本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对关联控件的强类型引用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对关联控件的强类型引用。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the control that is the container for the specified style.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回是指定样式的容器的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the DeviceSpecific/Choice construct associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与控件关联的 DeviceSpecific/Choice 构造。

trans-unit.source: The accessor returns <see langword="null" /> if no such construct exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在此类构造，则访问器返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The DeviceSpecific/Choice construct associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 与控件关联的 DeviceSpecific/Choice 构造。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> object that contains font information about the control.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含有关控件字体信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value specifying the font information about the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，指定有关控件的字体信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class has the following properties:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>类具有以下属性：

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Whether the font is bold.
trans-unit.target: 无论字体是加粗。

trans-unit.source: Whether the font is italic.
trans-unit.target: 是否为斜体字体。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for this font instance.
trans-unit.target: 此字体实例标识符。

trans-unit.source: The font size.
trans-unit.target: 字号。

trans-unit.source: The key for retrieving the style from the embedded style sheet for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Name" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Font" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于从 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Name" /> 属性的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Font" /> 属性的嵌入式样式表中检索样式的键。

trans-unit.source: Used internally by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The key for retrieving the style from the embedded style sheet for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Size" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Font" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于从 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Size" /> 属性的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Font" /> 属性的嵌入式样式表中检索样式的键。

trans-unit.source: Used internally by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified foreground color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置样式的指定前景色。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this property sets the color for the text.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于设置文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The specified foreground color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 样式的指定前景色。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> property to display text in different colors.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>属性在不同的颜色中显示文本。

trans-unit.source: The strings that can be used for colors are a set of fixed colors and hexadecimal RGB values.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的颜色的字符串是一组固定的颜色和十六进制 RGB 值。

trans-unit.source: These values can also be specified as "#bb7023".
trans-unit.target: 此外可以为"#bb7023"指定这些值。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Microsoft Windows color constants.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用 Microsoft Windows 颜色常量。

trans-unit.source: The key for retrieving the style from the embedded style sheet for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于从 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor" /> 属性的嵌入式样式表中检索样式的键。

trans-unit.source: Used internally by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The name of the specified template.
trans-unit.target: 指定的模板的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the template with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有指定名称的模板。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: The template with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名称的模板。

trans-unit.source: Returns `null` if the control is not templated, or if the template does not exist in the selected template set.
trans-unit.target: 返回`null`如果控件不是模板化，或者如果模板不存在所选的模板集中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> object has an active template set.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> 对象是否有活动的模板集。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the style has an active template set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果样式有活动模板集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To be considered templated, an object must have a [\<DeviceSpecific>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element with a `<Choice>` element successfully evaluated for the target device.
trans-unit.target: 若要被视为模板化，对象必须具有[\<设备特定 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)具有元素`<Choice>`元素已成功进行计算的目标设备。

trans-unit.source: The selected choice must have templates defined.
trans-unit.target: 所选的选择必须具有定义的模板。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: Called only from inherited style classes.
trans-unit.target: 调用只能从继承的样式类。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.RegisterStyle%2A> method to register a string property that supports inheritance and whose default value is an empty string ("").

trans-unit.source: A reference to the style properties for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> 对象的样式属性的引用。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.StyleReference%2A> property must be the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.StyleReference%2A>属性必须为<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Name%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.StyleReference%2A> property to share styles across controls, either by using inheritance or by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.StyleReference%2A> property of a style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.StyleReference%2A>属性通过使用继承或通过控件，在通过共享样式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.StyleReference%2A>样式表的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1) and [Creating New Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1)和[创建新样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1)。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.IsTrackingViewState%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: It also calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.State%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value that specifies the wrapping mode for the style.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，指定样式的换行模式。

trans-unit.source: The following table contains the definitions of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: 下表包含的定义<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration
trans-unit.target: 枚举

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: No size is set for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 没有大小设置为指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Wrap to the next line.
trans-unit.target: 换到下一行。

trans-unit.source: The text is not wrapped to the next line.
trans-unit.target: 在文本不换到下一行。

trans-unit.source: The key for retrieving the style from the embedded style sheet for <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Wrapping" />.
